channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15335] Add composite key support in row key
item.description: Add composite key filter support in the connector.
item.summary: Add composite key support in row key

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment: This patch is built on top of HBASE-15333, which delayed for a while. Upload this patch for preview.
